swdmt.redistricting

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • swdmt.redistricting.Region
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Region
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A region represents a politically-defined area comprised of locations and voters that occupy those locations. The region respects the association between locations and voters as given by each voters location attribute. Each voter may be associated with at most one location. Zero or more voters may be associated with each location.
    Version:
    20191128
    Author:
    Dr. Jody Paul
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Region()

      Creates a region based on a Collection of Voters.
      Region(int numberOfLocations)
      Creates a square region of contiguous locations, with the specified number of locations, and exactly one voter at each location.
      Region(Set<Location> locationSet, Set<Voter> voterSet)
      Creates a region defined by the specified set of locations and specified set of voters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Region

        public Region()
        Creates a zero-sized region.

      • Region

        public Region(int numberOfLocations)
        Creates a square region of contiguous locations, with the specified number of locations, and exactly one voter at each location. Location indices start at (0, 0) and increment monotonically.
        Parameters:
        numberOfLocations - the desired number of locations
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is not a perfect square

      • Region

        public Region(Collection<Voter> voterCollection)
        Creates a region based on a Collection of Voters. Uses each voters information to update location, voters and voterMap.
        Parameters:
        voterCollection - is a Collection of Voters

      • Region

        public Region(Set<Location> locationSet,
              Set<Voter> voterSet)
        Creates a region defined by the specified set of locations and specified set of voters. If any voter is associated with a location not in the specified set of locations, that voter is ignored (does not become a member of this region).
        Parameters:
        locationSet - the set of locations
        voterSet - the set of voters
